name: Stuck in a 'Loop'
description:
After an unknown incident, you ended up stuck in a swimming ring.  You need to find your friend and try to get unstuck!

Controls:

  • WASD- Movement
  • Mouse- Abilities

Alternate controls:

  • Left stick- Movement
  • Right stick- Aiming
  • Triggers- Abilities
  • [Unfortunately dialogue and menus do not work with the controller]
